main event: A retired Army major observed three unidentified flying objects in the sky over Phoenix, Arizona, on November 27, 1953.
interesting points: The objects were described as possibly round or oval and silver-colored., Two small objects were the size of a dime or nickel compared to a larger one the size of a silver dollar., The objects appeared to move rapidly and left a light tail when they did., The retired major noted that the objects hovered and zipped out of sight after about 5 minutes., There were bright flashing lights observed which varied greatly in their intensity.
